mapper.select: SELECT i.inventory_in_id, i.inventory_in_status, s.supplier_name AS inventory_in_supplier_name, i.inventory_in_time, i.inventory_in_create_time, a.account_name AS inventory_in_operator, i.inventory_in_variety, i.inventory_in_remarks, i.inventory_in_money FROM inventory_in_table i LEFT JOIN supplier_table s ON i.inventory_in_supplier_id = s.supplier_id LEFT JOIN account_table a ON i.inventory_in_operator_id = a.account_id WHERE i.inventory_in_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND i.inventory_in_id = #{id}
